Question
========

Given two independent stochastic variables X and Y with standard deviations 12 and 5, respectively. Now suppose that Z = X - Y. The s.d. of Z is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 7
* 10.9
* 13
* 17

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 7: Incorrect
* 10.9: Incorrect
* 13: Correct
* 17: Incorrect
